sections.title: Keyboard
sections.content: To control the RGB keyboard and improve function keys functionality, install tuxedo-drivers-dkmsAUR.

sections.title: Power management
sections.content: See TUXEDO InfinityBook Pro 15v4#TUXEDO Control Center.

sections.title: Video
sections.content: The Aura 15 uses an AMD Radeon RX Vega graphics chip with GCN5 GPU architecture, hence xf86-video-amdgpu should be the correct video driver.

sections.title: Fingerprint scanner
sections.content: Using a modified libfprint, it is possible to use fprintd as authentication agent alongside PAM just like with regular libfprint. The patch brings changes that improve the (previously catastrophic) false negative rate, making the fingerprint scanner actually usable and convenient.
